definitions.title: vb. Pi. denom.
definitions.body: weigh, make level (Ph. [[פלס]] Pi. make level (?)  in n.pr.) ;—Impf. 3 ms. [[יְפַלֵּס]] Ps 78:20; 2 mpl. [[תְּפַלֵּסָוּן]] Ps 58:3 (v.infr.), etc.; Imv. ms. [[פַּלֵּס]] Pr 4:26; Pt. [[מְפַלֵּס]] Pr 5:11; —
weign out [[חֲמַס יְדֵיכֶם תּפי]] Ps 58:3 (fig.; but read perh. [[תָמָס יְדֵיכֶם תְּפַלֵּסְנׇה]] violence do your hands weigh out, so LXX SyrVer Targum Bae Kau We).
make level, smooth (cf. Gerber:32), c. acc. of path (fig.), [[מַעְגׇּל]] Pr 4:26, Pr 5:21, Is 26:7, [[נׇתִּיב]] Ps 78:50, [[אׂרַח]] Pr 5:6.
